title.rendered: Take advantage of our special offer, plan 2023 vacation today, and book your accommodation in the best hotel in Zagreb!

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Black Friday 30% OFF all 2023 bookings 

 

Indulge in sumptuous rooms, distinctive service, and impressive views of the city. Get 30% off accommodation in this unique historical hotel in the heart of Zagreb, which will delight you with its long tradition, beautiful architecture and interior, and award-winning gourmet offer.

 

Book your accommodation through hotel’s website www.esplanade.hr and enter the code BLACK22, available only on Black Friday, 25 November 2022, from 0:00 to 23:59! Bookings can only be made through the official website of the Esplanade Hotel for the period of 1 January to 30 December 2023, subject to availability of accommodation. The discount only applies to the booking of accommodation, and not the food and drinks offer. The discount cannot be exchanged for money or other hotel services and cannot be combined or aggregated with other discounts.

 

The accommodation booking can be cancelled free of charge only by 16:00 hrs on the day before arrival. In case of cancellation after this time or in case of no-show, your credit card will be charged for the first night at the price stated in your booking confirmation.

 

Book your accommodation:
BLACK FRIDAY BOOKING
For any additional information, please contact the Reservations department:
T. +385 (0)1 45 666 00
E. reservations@esplanade.hr

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
